# MLModelCollection

**Class**

A set of Core ML models from a model deployment.

## Declaration

```swift
class MLModelCollection
```

## Overview

Use a model collection to access the models from a Core ML Model Deployment. For example, you can use a model collection to replace one or more of your app’s built-in models with a newer version.

To access the newest model collection from a deployment, call the [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLModelCollection/beginAccessingModelCollectionWithIdentifier:completionHandler:] type method. Your app can also get a notification when Core ML receives an update to a model collection (see [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLModelCollection/didChangeNotification]).

## Accessing a model collection

- **endAccessing(identifier:)**: Terminates access to a model collection.

## Identifying a model collection

- **identifier**: The name of the model collection, unique to the development team.
- **deploymentID**: The unique identifier of the model collection’s deployment.

## Retreiving models from a collection

- **entries**: A dictionary of model entries keyed to the models’ identifiers.
- **MLModelCollection.Entry**: A model and its identifier within a model collection.

## Registering for model collection updates

- **didChangeNotification**: The notification the framework sends when it receives an update to a model collection.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
